sentences.en: a more liberal attitude towards sexuality
sentences.cn: 对两性关系比较开通的态度

sentences.en: As always he is liberal with his jokes.
sentences.cn: 像平时一样，他出口就是笑话。

sentences.en: Bennett launched a crusade for "moral values" against decadent "liberal relativism."
sentences.cn: 贝内特发起了一场捍卫“道德价值”、反对腐朽堕落的“自由相对论”的战争。

sentences.en: He has a liberal attitude to divorce and remarriage.
sentences.cn: 他对离婚和再婚看得很开.

sentences.en: He is of a liberal disposition.
His basic outlook remains anchored in the liberal tradition.
sentences.cn: 他的基本观念依旧扎根于自由主义传统。

sentences.en: I'm not a bleeding heart liberal.
sentences.cn: 我可不是只说不做的自由主义者。

sentences.en: Oxford's social circle was far too liberal for her taste.
sentences.cn: 牛津的社交圈过于开放,不合她的胃口.

sentences.en: She is known to have liberal views on divorce and contraception.
sentences.cn: 众所周知，她在离婚与避孕方面思想很开明。

sentences.en: She made liberal use of her elder sister's make-up and clothes.
sentences.cn: 她随便把姐姐的化妆品和衣服拿来用。

sentences.en: Some politicians want more liberal trade relations with Europe.
sentences.cn: 有些政治家想与欧洲大陆建立更加自由的贸易关系。

sentences.en: The attitude of the medical profession is very much more liberal now.
sentences.cn: 现在，医务人员的态度开明多了。

sentences.en: The Liberal Bloc voted for the tax increase.
sentences.cn: 开明集团投票赞成增税.

sentences.en: These kinds of price controls go against all the financial principles of the free market liberals.
sentences.cn: 这些价格控制违反了支持自由市场的自由主义者的所有金融原则。

sentences.en: They were liberal in their help.
This shows him to be liberal and friendly.
sentences.cn: 这表明了他的心胸宽广和友好.

words.tran_cn: 大方地；自由地；公平地；充足地
自由主义；开明的思想或见解
慷慨，大方；心胸宽阔，胸怀广阔
自由化；自由主义化；放宽限制
开明的;大量的;心胸宽阔的

phrases.tran_cn: 自由民主；自由民主主义；自由民主制（一种政府形式，由人民选出的民意代表行使决策权力）
自由民主党（成员）；自民党人

trans.tran_cn: 开明的，自由的，慷慨的，不拘泥的
trans.tran_en: allowing people or organizations a lot of political or economic freedom

trans.tran_cn: 自由主义者，自由党党员
